yuiNavSteps.flpCredentialsDesc: Enter credentials for your adaptation project's system: ({{- system}}).
yuiNavSteps.sysConfirmDesc: Validates connection to the configured system.
yuiNavSteps.flpConfigDesc: SAP Fiori launchpad configuration for {{- projectName}}.

error.projectNotSupported: Unable to find a supported adaptation project.
error.fetchingManifest: An error occurred when fetching the merged manifest for the base application.
error.destinationNotFound: Missing destination configuration in the `ui5.yaml` file.
error.destinationNotInSubaccount: Destination not found in the subaccount: {{- destination}}.
error.systemNotFound: Missing system configuration in the `ui5.yaml` file.
error.systemNotFoundInStore: System not found in the system store: {{- systemUrl}}.
error.writingPhase: An error occurred in the writing phase of the adaptation project's SAP Fiori launchpad configuration.
error.telemetry: An error occurred when sending telemetry data. Error: {{- error}}.
error.updatingApp: An error occurred updating the application with the SAP Fiori launchpad configuration. For more information, view the logs.
